abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks any targeted spells.

abilities.name: Blink Fragment
abilities.description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion.

abilities.name: Counterspell Ally
abilities.description: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks any targeted spells. Any time a spell is blocked by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

facets.name: antimage_magebanes_mirror
facets.title: Magebane's Mirror
facets.description: Counterspell Ally reflects amplified versions of spells back to their caster.

facets.name: antimage_mana_thirst
facets.title: Mana Thirst
facets.description:
Passively grants attack damage when an enemy hero's mana falls below 60%, with the bonuses increasing as their mana falls further.

 If the enemies mana falls below 15% Anti-Mage gains the maximum amount of damage, as well as vision and True Sight of that hero. Applies to enemy heroes within 2500 range. Bonuses stack per hero.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.

abilities.name: Coat of Blood
abilities.description: Whenever Axe gets a kill, he permanently gains 0.2 armor. Killing with Culling Blade gives 3x that amount.

facets.name: axe_one_man_army
facets.title: One Man Army
facets.description: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.

facets.name: axe_call_out
facets.title: Call Out
facets.description: Berserker's Call gives Axe increased bonus armor and increases the attack speed of the affected units.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage Nightmared targets freely.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

abilities.name: Ichor of Nyctasha
abilities.description: Bane's attribute gains are always evenly distributed across all three attributes (items that grant +3 Strength will now grant +1 Str/Agi/Int).

facets.name: bane_dream_stalker
facets.title: Dream Stalker
facets.description: Bane has increased attack speed when attacking Nightmared units.

facets.name: bane_sleepwalk
facets.title: Sleepwalk
facets.description: Nightmared units walk in Bane's chosen direction.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 100%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.

abilities.name: Blood Mist
abilities.description:
Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Sanguivore's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. 

Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.

abilities.name: Sanguivore
abilities.description:
Bloodseeker restores some life when he kills a unit, equal to 1.5% of the units max health per Bloodseeker's Level plus a base of 25.

Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.

facets.name: bloodseeker_arterial_spray
facets.title: Arterial Spray
facets.description: Ruptured units are pushed when attacked by Bloodseeker.

facets.name: bloodseeker_bloodrush
facets.title: Bloodrush
facets.description: Can be activated to grant bonus movement speed for a short duration. Grants no passive movement speed while on cooldown. Cannot be cast when all enemy heroes are at full health.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Deals 4x damage to non-ancient creeps.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3x the mana regeneration.

abilities.name: Crystal Clone
abilities.description: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.

abilities.name: Blueheart Floe
abilities.description: Crystal Maiden has 50% Mana Regeneration Amplification.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_frozen_expanse
facets.title: Frozen Expanse
facets.description: Freezing Field also passively increases Crystal Maiden's cast range and area of effect.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_cold_comfort
facets.title: Cold Comfort
facets.description: Every time Crystal Maiden casts a spell, allies close to her receive mana equal to a percentage of the spell's mana cost.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Glacier
abilities.description: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.

abilities.name: Precision Aura
abilities.description: Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility and level.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.

facets.name: drow_ranger_high_ground
facets.title: Vantage Point
facets.description: Drow deals 20% more damage when attacking from high ground.

facets.name: drow_ranger_sidestep
facets.title: Sidestep
facets.description: Drow can move slowly and use items while casting Multishot.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

facets.name: earthshaker_tectonic_buildup
facets.title: Tectonic Buildup
facets.description: Aftershock radius is increased by 50 every 10 hero levels.

facets.name: earthshaker_slugger
facets.title: Slugger
facets.description: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Juggernaut deals damage in an interval equal to 2x his attack speed. Applies a strong dispel at the end of the spin.

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Swiftslash
abilities.description: Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.

abilities.name: Duelist
abilities.description: Juggernaut deals 10% more damage to targets that are facing him. Damage bonus always applies during Omnislash.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: juggernaut_bladestorm
facets.title: Bladestorm
facets.description: Blade Fury can now critically strike based on the level of Blade Dance.

facets.name: juggernaut_agigain
facets.title: Bladeform
facets.description: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 2.6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Selemene's Faithful
abilities.description: Healing Lotuses are 20% more effective on Mirana and her allies.

facets.name: mirana_moonlight
facets.title: Moonlight Shadow
facets.description: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies invisiblity and movement speed.

facets.name: mirana_sunlight
facets.title: Solar Flare
facets.description: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies increasing attack speed and damage over time.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.

abilities.name: Feast of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed for 8 seconds. After the effect finishes, Shadow Fiend loses a fixed amount of souls.

abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 30% of them from bondage. Every hero kill increases max souls by 1 until Shadow Fiend dies.

facets.name: nevermore_lasting_presence
facets.title: Lasting Presence
facets.description: Presence of the Dark Lord temporarily reduces more armor after nearby enemy heroes are killed.

facets.name: nevermore_shadowmire
facets.title: Shadowmire
facets.description: Applies a stacking 5% movement speed and 5 attack speed debuff on enemies hit.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform and attacks all enemies it goes through with a penalty.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
abilities.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Accumulation
abilities.description: Morphling receives 50% of stat growth bonuses every half level instead of the full bonus at level up. Morphling receives +100% bonus stats from All Attributes bonus from skill points in the Talent Tree.

facets.name: morphling_agi
facets.title: Ebb
facets.description: The target is also knocked back based on Morphling's strength.

facets.name: morphling_str
facets.title: Flow
facets.description: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Strength and Attribute Shift can accelerate his cooldowns.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targeting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

facets.name: phantom_lancer_convergence
facets.title: Convergence
facets.description: Spawns an additional illusion per 25% of health that Phantom Lancer is missing.

facets.name: phantom_lancer_divergence
facets.title: Divergence
facets.description: Juxtapose Illusions spawn on random nearby units and deal more damage but can't be controlled.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Puckish
abilities.description: Whenever Puck disjoints an attack, it restores 2% of its max mana and 2% of its max health. Dodging a targeted spell projectile restores 4x that amount.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

facets.name: puck_jostling_rift
facets.title: Jostling Rift
facets.description: Waning Rift pushes enemies away. If the ability is in alt-cast state, it will pull them instead.

facets.name: puck_curveball
facets.title: Curveball
facets.description: Illusory Orb can now be vector targeted to manipulate the orb's travel path. The orb moves faster and lasts longer, but if it exceeds the max cast range it will be destroyed.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Meat Shield
abilities.description: Pudge covers himself with a layer of flesh that blocks damage of any type taken from any source.

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero, he permanently gains 1.1 bonus Strength.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range.

facets.name: pudge_fresh_meat
facets.title: Fresh Meat
facets.description: Dismember increases Strength when dealing damage to heroes.

facets.name: pudge_flayers_hook
facets.title: Flayer's Hook
facets.description: Meat Hook deals bonus damage based on the distance pulled, but base damage is reduced.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.

abilities.name: Storm Surge
abilities.description: There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed by 1% per hero level.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at the enemy unit with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing armor.

facets.name: razor_thunderhead
facets.title: Thunderhead
facets.description: While Eye of the Storm is active, strike chance is 2x as high and Lightning strikes all enemies within Eye of the Storm's radius. Does not apply to the same enemy twice from a single instance.

facets.name: razor_spellamp
facets.title: Dynamo
facets.description: Razor gains 1% spell amplification for every 20 points of attack damage.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit

 Can be put on alt-cast to immediately cast in the desired direction, without walking towards the targeted location.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

abilities.name: Stinger
abilities.description: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack with bonus damage on all enemies in the area of effect. Enemies within an innermost radius of 125 take 40% extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After a cast point of 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

facets.name: sand_king_sandshroud
facets.title: Sandshroud
facets.description: Sand Storm has increased radius and grants Sand King Invisibility while in it.

facets.name: sand_king_dust_devil
facets.title: Dust Devil
facets.description: Sand Storm follows Sand King at a rate of 70% of his movement speed and is still active at a distance of up to 2500 units away from Sand King.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: Galvanized
abilities.description: Storm Spirit gains a charge of 0.2 mana regeneration per kill. Loses 3 charges per death. Leveling Ball Lightning gives Storm Spirit 3 bonus charges. Additionally every time he gains a charge he also gains 0.1 Mana Regen permanently.

facets.name: storm_spirit_shock_collar
facets.title: Shock Collar
facets.description: Electric Vortex applies a debuff to the enemy that lasts for 5s that triggers an Overload Charge if they attack.

facets.name: storm_spirit_static_slide
facets.title: Static Slide
facets.description: Static Remnants spawn at Storm Spirit and move to the target position.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Vanquisher
abilities.description: Sven's attacks deal 17% bonus damage to stunned enemies.

facets.name: sven_heavy_plate
facets.title: Heavy Plate
facets.description: Warcry provides a physical damage barrier.

facets.name: sven_strscaling
facets.title: Wrath of God
facets.description: Sven gains additional attack damage from Strength, but has decreased base damage.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 100% bonus damage to units being tossed.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

abilities.name: Tree Volley
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior
abilities.description: Enemies that attack Tiny receive a stacking debuff that lowers their attack damage with each stack.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, movement speed and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.

abilities.name: Tree Throw
abilities.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

facets.name: tiny_crash_landing
facets.title: Crash Landing
facets.description: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss destination.

facets.name: tiny_insurmountable
facets.title: Insurmountable
facets.description: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy hero kills Vengeful Spirit, they get a debuff until their next death, causing Vengeful Spirit to deal 10% bonus damage to them.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.

facets.name: vengefulspirit_avenging_missile
facets.title: Avenging Missile
facets.description: Magic Missile deals 0.75 bonus damage for every creep the enemy has killed.

facets.name: vvengefulspirit_melee
facets.title: Soul Strike
facets.description: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which slows and deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow power is reduced.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.

abilities.name: Gale Force
abilities.description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 350 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.

abilities.name: Easy Breezy
abilities.description: Windranger's movement speed cannot be lower than 240 and can reach 600.

facets.name: windrunner_tailwind
facets.title: Tailwind
facets.description: Windrun grants additional bonus movement speed to Windranger and nearby allies.

facets.name: windrunner_whirlwind
facets.title: Whirlwind
facets.description: Focus Fire no longer requires a target, instead firing at random enemies within Windranger's attack range. Fires a fixed number of attacks per second, and can only hit the same enemy every 4 shots. Prioritizes Heroes.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

abilities.name: Heavenly Jump
abilities.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Hands
abilities.description: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to a percentage of their current health.

facets.name: zuus_livewire
facets.title: Livewire
facets.description: Static Field deals more damage to nearby enemies.

facets.name: zuus_divine_rampage
facets.title: Divine Rampage
facets.description: Damage is dealt to one enemy at a time, moving from lowest health hero to highest. If an enemy is killed by this ability, the damage for all subsequent enemies is increased.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.name: Torrent Storm
abilities.description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within 1100 range of the target position once every 0.25 for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

facets.name: kunkka_high_tide
facets.title: High Tide
facets.description: Tidebringer cooldown is reduced per enemy hero it hits.

facets.name: kunkka_grog
facets.title: Grog Blossom
facets.description: When X Marks the Spot returns its target, nearby allies gain Ghostship's Damage Delay buff.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.

abilities.name: Flame Cloak
abilities.description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

facets.name: lina_supercharge
facets.title: Thermal Runaway
facets.description: Casting Laguna Blade temporarily supercharges Lina, granting her stacks of Fiery Soul.

facets.name: lina_dot
facets.title: Slow Burn
facets.description: Lina's spells deal extra damage over time.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds. The primary target receives both base and area damage.

abilities.name: Frost Shield
abilities.description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Sinister Gaze
abilities.description:
CHANNELED. Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.

Lich can use his other abilities while channeling this ability. 

 If cast on a creep lasts 2x longer and deals 250 damage per second.

abilities.name: Ice Spire
abilities.description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can be cast on the Spire and can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.

abilities.name: Death Charge
abilities.description: Lich cannot gain passive mana regeneration, but any unit dying within 1200 range of Lich restores 2.5% of his Max Mana (Dying heroes restore 15% of Lich's Max Mana). Instant mana restoration from items and abilities apply to Lich as normal.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.

facets.name: lich_frostbound
facets.title: Frostbound
facets.description: Chain Frost lingers on its last target if it fails to bounce and can bounce again if new targets become available.

facets.name: lich_growing_cold
facets.title: Growing Cold
facets.description: Killing an enemy with Chain Frost increases the number of bounces.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time. Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a 50% rate.

abilities.name: To Hell and Back
abilities.description: Lion gains 20% debuff duration and 20% spell amplification for 90s after respawning.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

facets.name: lion_essence_eater
facets.title: Essence Eater
facets.description: Mana Drain deals damage equal to 100% of mana stolen.

facets.name: lion_fist_of_death
facets.title: Fist of Death
facets.description: After casting Finger of Death, Lion switches from ranged to melee attacks and gains bonus damage and cleave. Enemy heroes killed within 3s of being punched will add Finger of Death stacks.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.

abilities.name: Fowl Play
abilities.description:
When taking lethal damage, Shadow Shaman receives a strong dispel and survives as a 1 HP chicken. Incoming damage is reduced to zero for 0.75s.Cooldown is reset upon respawning.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

facets.name: shadow_shaman_cluster_cluck
facets.title: Cluster Cluck
facets.description: Creates 3 other chicken illusions as well.

facets.name: shadow_shaman_massive_serpent_ward
facets.title: Massive Serpent Ward
facets.description: Summons a single massive Serpent Ward with 10x damage and bounty values and 7.5x health.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.

abilities.name: Seaborn Sentinel
abilities.description: Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration, attack damage, and armor while in a puddle or river.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.

facets.name: slardar_leg_day
facets.title: Leg Day
facets.description: Slardar has slow resistance and even more movement speed at the beginning of Guardian Sprint.

facets.name: slardar_brineguard
facets.title: Brineguard
facets.description: Corrosive Haze increases Slardar's armor by 40% of the total armor reduced.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Dead in the Water
abilities.description: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Blubber
abilities.description:
Tidehunter's hide removes negative status effects if he takes more than 500 damage. Removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

facets.name: tidehunter_kraken_swell
facets.title: Kraken Swell
facets.description: Kraken Shell gains permanent Damage Block when an enemy hero dies under the effects of Anchor Smash.

facets.name: tidehunter_sizescale
facets.title: Krill Eater
facets.description: Tidehunter grows larger and gains extra bonuses per level.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Deals 150% damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

abilities.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
abilities.description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

abilities.name: Gris-Gris
abilities.description:
Witch Doctor gets a Gris-Gris, an item that cannot be dropped or placed in the backpack. When the owner dies, 100% of the gold lost from death is added to the item, and will be refunded when the item is consumed. The value of the Gris-Gris is increased by 1 every 3s. 

 Right-click to consume and permanently remove the item.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.

facets.name: witch_doctor_headhunter
facets.title: Headhunter
facets.description: Paralyzing Cask deals more damage each bounce.

facets.name: witch_doctor_voodoo_festeration
facets.title: Voodoo Festeration
facets.description: Voodoo Restoration deals damage to enemies and only heals Witch Doctor.

facets.name: witch_doctor_cleft_death
facets.title: Cleft Death
facets.description: Death Ward attacks 1 targets at once with reduced damage.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies. Enemies attacking from the smoke or attacking allies within the smoke have a chance to miss their attacks.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him. While phased out his attack damage is reduced, but his Agility greatly increases.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

facets.name: riki_contract_killer
facets.title: Contract Killer
facets.description: Riki receives bonus experience for assists and kills.

facets.name: riki_exterminator
facets.title: Exterminator
facets.description: Tricks of the Trade has 4x Agility Bonus when attacking non-hero units.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Summoning
abilities.description: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health. The eidolons health is increased by 3% of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing 5 + a percentage of the enemies current HP as damage.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Allies within 500 distance from Enigma have up to 15% Damage Reduction. Effect starts at 0% at max distance and increases to its maximum strength when the ally is at 200 distance. Does not affect Enigma itself.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

facets.name: enigma_gravity
facets.title: Event Horizon
facets.description: Units in a 600 radius moving away from Enigma have a 15% movespeed penalty.

facets.name: enigma_fragment
facets.title: Splitting Image
facets.description: Enigma spawns Eidolons upon receiving damage.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, damaging and blinding the target. Blinded targets miss all physical attacks.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

abilities.name: Warp Flare
abilities.description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on Tinker's abilities.

abilities.name: Eureka!
abilities.description: Tinker gains 1% item cooldown reduction per 3 Intelligence, up to a maximum of 60%.

facets.name: tinker_repair_bots
facets.title: Repair Bots
facets.description: March of the Machines applies a non-stacking heal over time when passing through allied heroes.

facets.name: tinker_translocator
facets.title: Translocator
facets.description:
When a Self-Defense Matrix barrier on Tinker is fully absorbed, he blinks in a random forward direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Knockback distance increases based on how close the enemy is to Sniper. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100%.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Increases armor, Headshot chance, and attack range. Slows you by 65% for the duration.

abilities.name: Concussive Grenade
abilities.description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

abilities.name: Keen Scope
abilities.description: Increases Sniper's attack range.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals Sniper's attack damage plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.

facets.name: sniper_ghillie_suit
facets.title: Ghillie Suit
facets.description: While Take Aim is active, Sniper's attacks do not reveal him from fog of war.

facets.name: sniper_scattershot
facets.title: Scattershot
facets.description: Shrapnel slow and damage are increased, but duration is decreased.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

abilities.name: Death Seeker
abilities.description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

abilities.name: Sadist
abilities.description: Necrophos gains stacking regen for 8 seconds for each unit he kills. Hero kills multiply the effect.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

facets.name: necrolyte_profane_potency
facets.title: Profane Potency
facets.description: Sadist also grants Necrophos' AoE abilities and items bonus Radius per kill.

facets.name: necrolyte_rapid_decay
facets.title: Rapid Decay
facets.description: Necrophos gains movement speed equal to 40% of movement speed lost by enemies.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, casting a spell on a unit that makes it deal damage to nearby enemy units and heal nearby ally units. Target Unit will also heal or be damaged depending on whether they are ally or enemy.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

abilities.name: Eldritch Summoning
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy unit dies while afflicted by one or more of Warlock's abilities, a minor imp is summoned that lasts for 15 seconds and explodes on death. Imps will automatically seek out nearby units, favoring fatally bonded heroes, and will explode when reaching their prey.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has increased Slow Resistance, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

facets.name: warlock_golem
facets.title: Champion of Gorroth
facets.description: Chaotic Offering Golems deal more burn damage based on Warlock's health and mana regeneration.

facets.name: warlock_grimoire
facets.title: Black Grimoire
facets.description: Grants Warlock the item Black Grimoire, which can be consumed to gain experience for each kill Warlock participated in. Starts with 1 charge.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every 4s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of Beastmaster and units he controls, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: Drums of Slom
abilities.description:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.4s between hits after 20 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.

facets.name: beastmaster_wild_hunt
facets.title: Wild Hunt
facets.description: Attack Speed bonus is increased by the number of units affected by Inner Beast.

facets.name: beastmaster_beast_mode
facets.title: Beast Mode
facets.description: Can be activated to increase Beastmaster's attack speed and allow him to apply the Wild Axes damage amplification debuff on his attack target.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 16 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Bondage
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy within 1200 range deals spell damage to Queen of Pain, she returns 10% of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

facets.name: queenofpain_lifesteal
facets.title: Succubus
facets.description: Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies.

facets.name: queenofpain_selfdmg
facets.title: Masochist
facets.description: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Noxious Plague
abilities.description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

facets.name: venomancer_patient_zero
facets.title: Patient Zero
facets.description: Noxious Plague spreads 1 times. Impact damage for spreads after the first one is reduced by 100%.

facets.name: venomancer_plague_carrier
facets.title: Plague Carrier
facets.description: Plague Wards can be attached to allies and have 3 charges. Attached wards give only 20% of their gold bounty when killed.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 7% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown. The debuff does not tick down while inside Chronosphere.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.

abilities.name: Reverse Time Walk
abilities.description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

abilities.name: Distortion Field
abilities.description: Enemy Attack Projectiles within 600 radius are slowed by 35%.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. All ability and item cooldowns are frozen. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

facets.name: faceless_void_temporal_impunity
facets.title: Temporal Impunity
facets.description: Prevents all damage for a short duration after casting Time Walk.

facets.name: faceless_void_time_zone
facets.title: Time Zone
facets.description: Chronosphere is replaced by an effect that dramatically slows down enemies and speeds up allies in an area.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.

abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
abilities.description: Grants Wraith King Lifesteal. When slain Wraith King turns into a free pathing Wraith with Bonus Attack and Movement Speed for a short duration, delaying his death.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius are slowed. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.

facets.name: skeleton_king_facet_bone_guard
facets.title: Bone Guard
facets.description: When reincarnating, 2 skeletons are spawned and attack each nearby enemy hero.

facets.name: skeleton_king_facet_cursed_blade
facets.title: Spectral Blade
facets.description: When reincarnating, nearby enemy heroes have their curse cooldowns reset.

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

abilities.name: Witchcraft
abilities.description: Death Prophet's occult knowledge deepens with experience, gaining 0.75% movement speed per level, and 0.5% spell cooldown reduction per level.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 40 seconds.Increases Death Prophet's movement speed while active.

facets.name: death_prophet_suppress
facets.title: Suppress
facets.description: Silenced enemies are also slowed.

facets.name: death_prophet_ghosts
facets.title: Spirit Collector
facets.description: Other heroes' deaths empower your next Exorcism.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+30% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin blurs her body, increasing her movement speed, causing her to be impossible to see until she attacks or comes near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

abilities.name: Immaterial
abilities.description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Evasion improves with Phantom Assassin's levels. 

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.

facets.name: phantom_assassin_veiled_one
facets.title: Veiled One
facets.description: Blur is no longer dispelled when attacking and reduces mana costs during and after Blur.

facets.name: phantom_assassin_methodical
facets.title: Methodical
facets.description: Coup de Grace procs every 6 attacks on the same hero or 4 attacks on non hero units.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area. Deals 65% damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.

abilities.name: Oblivion Savant
abilities.description: Pugna can cast spells and use items while channeling.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

facets.name: pugna_siphoning_ward
facets.title: Siphoning Ward
facets.description: Nether Ward restores mana and health to Pugna based on how much damage is dealt.

facets.name: pugna_rewards_of_ruin
facets.title: Rewards of Ruin
facets.description: Pugna receives 1.5% spell amplification per destroyed enemy tower.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, gaining a small barrier and bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances. If a barrier is consumed, a new one is created as long as there are charges left. If an instance of damage would deal more damage than the remaining barrier, all of the damage is absorbed.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.

abilities.name: Psionic Projection
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 2 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 300 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of 20% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 50% after 3.5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

facets.name: templar_assassin_voidblades
facets.title: Voidblades
facets.description: Enemies hit by Psi Blades split damage are slowed.

facets.name: templar_assassin_refractor
facets.title: Refractor
facets.description: Whenever a shield instance is consumed, Templar Assassin gains a damage instance.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 6 times.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1200 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Nosedive
abilities.description: Viper slams into the ground, splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

facets.name: viper_poison_burst
facets.title: Poison Burst
facets.description: After Poison Attack stacks expire, enemies around the target take additional damage equal to 100% of the magic damage dealt by Poison Attack.

facets.name: viper_caustic_bath
facets.title: Caustic Bath
facets.description: Viper's Corrosive Skin effects are increased while he is in Nethertoxin.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaives
abilities.description:
Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

 Moon Glaives can be activated to create 3 glaives that rotate around Luna for 7s. Any enemy unit that collides with a glaive will take a percentage of Luna's Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving 200% of the attack damage bonus allies receive. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.

abilities.name: Selemene's Favor
abilities.description: At night, Luna receives 20% bonus cast range.

facets.name: luna_lunar_orbit
facets.title: Lunar Orbit
facets.description: Rotating glaives provide damage reduction while active.

facets.name: luna_moonstorm
facets.title: Moonstorm
facets.description: Grants Luna an attack damage bonus buff every time an enemy hero is hit by Lucent Beam. Lucent Beams created by Eclipse grant 50% of the damage amount.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it and dealing damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 450.

abilities.name: Wyrm's Wrath
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves Dragon Knight's attacks. When in Dragon form, these attack effects are stronger.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons. Increases movement speed and attack damage, with Wyrm's Wrath on-hit effects applying to all enemies near the target. Increases Dragon Tail range. Increases health regeneration and armor bonuses from Dragon Blood.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves Dragon Knight's health regeneration and armor. Amount for both values is increased by 0.5 per level and is multiplied when in Dragon Form.

facets.name: dragon_knight_fire_dragon
facets.title: Fire Dragon
facets.description: Cleave is transformed into Splash damage, adding the bonus damage percentage while in Elder Dragon Form.

facets.name: dragon_knight_corrosive_dragon
facets.title: Corrosive Dragon
facets.description: Damage and Armor Reduction from Corrosive Breath is increased while in Elder Dragon Form.

facets.name: dragon_knight_frost_dragon
facets.title: Frost Dragon
facets.description: Attack speed, movement speed and healing reduction from Frost Breath is increased while in Elder Dragon Form.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby. Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Weave
abilities.description: Dazzle's abilities apply Weave to both allies and enemies they affect, increasing allied armor and reducing enemy armor. Multiple instances of this effect stack.

abilities.name: Bad Juju
abilities.description: Decreases the remaining cooldown of all other abilities. Casting Bad Juju temporarily increases its health cost.

facets.name: dazzle_facet_nothl_boon
facets.title: Nothl Boon
facets.description: Dazzle's overhealing is converted into a barrier.

facets.name: dazzle_poison_bloom
facets.title: Poison Bloom
facets.description: Every 4 attacks, the poison will deal additional damage and split to additional enemy units in a 450 AoE.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description:
Forms a ring of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Damage is increased by 50% of the mana burned.

 Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can push them up to 1000 distance away with one hit.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Overclocking
abilities.description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.

abilities.name: Jetpack
abilities.description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a 175 radius around the hit target. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

abilities.name: Armor Power
abilities.description: Clockwerk's outgoing damage increases by 0.3% per point of armor.

facets.name: rattletrap_hookup
facets.title: Hookup
facets.description: When hitting an ally, Hookshot has a larger impact radius, grants Clockwerk and the hit allies a physical damage barrier, equal to the hookshot damage, and partially refunds its cooldown.

facets.name: rattletrap_expanded_armature
facets.title: Expanded Armature
facets.description: Power Cogs form in a larger radius.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and buildings. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies have their move speed and attack speed slowed.

abilities.name: Nihilism
abilities.description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

abilities.name: Defilement
abilities.description: Leshrac gains AoE per intelligence.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

facets.name: leshrac_attacks_mana
facets.title: Chronoptic Nourishment
facets.description: Leshrac's attacks restore mana.

facets.name: leshrac_misanthropy
facets.title: Misanthropy
facets.description: Diabolic Edict explosion rate increased but it no longer damages buildings.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, damaging and trapping it in place and providing vision in a 250 radius.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map. Gains a barrier after arriving to its destination.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.

abilities.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
abilities.description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Forest
abilities.description: Nature's Prophet gains 2% bonus damage for each tree within 300 and a multiplier of that same bonus for each treant within 1200 distance of him.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

facets.name: furion_soothing_saplings
facets.title: Soothing Saplings
facets.description: Allies inside and nearby on the outside of the sprout are healed over time. Allied buildings are healed at a 50% rate.

facets.name: furion_ironwood_treant
facets.title: Ironwood Treant
facets.description: Treant multiplier increased.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description:
