Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Debuff Immune and increasing magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: Ghoul Frenzy
abilities.description: Passively grants Lifestealer Movement and Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health. Allows Lifestealer to attack allied creeps at 75% health.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: life_stealer_maxhp_gain
facets.title: Corpse Eater
facets.description: Lifestealer gains 1 HP whenever he kills a creep, and 5 whenever he kills a hero.

facets.name: life_stealer_rage_dispell
facets.title: Unfettered
facets.description: Rage gets replaced by an ability allowing Lifestealer to dispel himself and become more resilient even when stunned.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.

abilities.name: Normal Punch
abilities.description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 1100 distance moved.

abilities.name: Mental Fortitude
abilities.description: Dark Seer's Intelligence cannot be lower than either his Strength or Agility.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows, damages, and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

facets.name: dark_seer_atkspd
facets.title: Quick Wit
facets.description: Dark Seer also gains Attack Speed from Intelligence.

facets.name: dark_seer_movespd
facets.title: Heart of Battle
facets.description: Dark Seer moves faster when near other heroes.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Skeleton Archers within a 1200 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 60% of the attack speed bonus. 

 Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.

abilities.name: Tar Bomb
abilities.description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for 5 seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

 When the Tar Bomb hits, any Skeleton Archers within attack range will attack the target.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description:
Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly Skeleton Archer and creates a Skeleton Archer in their place, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk. 

Only one archer can be summoned from Death Pact at a time.

abilities.name: Burning Barrage
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers, and dousing enemies with Tar Bomb slow.

abilities.name: Burning Army
abilities.description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Skeleton Archers.

abilities.name: Bone and Arrow
abilities.description:
Clinkz summons a Skeleton Archer when he dies. Skeleton Archers are immobile and die within multiple attacks from a hero. Skeleton Archers deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, and deal less damage to buildings. Attack range is equal to Clinkz' attack range.

Some of Clinkz' other abilities can also summon Skeleton Archers.

facets.name: clinkz_suppressive_fire
facets.title: Suppressive Fire
facets.description: Clinkz and each Skeleton Archer apply a stacking debuff, one stack per attacking Skeleton Archer, causing them to miss 5% of their attacks per stack. Applies to buildings as well.

facets.name: clinkz_engulfing_step
facets.title: Engulfing Step
facets.description: Death Pact teleports Clinkz towards his victim. Reduces Death Pact cooldown.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: Grants Debuff Immunity to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage.

abilities.name: Degen Aura
abilities.description: Degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants a target ally immunity from physical damage.

facets.name: omniknight_omnipresent
facets.title: Omnipresent
facets.description: Omniknight's damage to a target is increased by 1% for every 0.3s they spend affected by the aura.

facets.name: omniknight_dmgheals
facets.title: Healing Hammer
facets.description: Ability damage done to enemies by Omniknight heals him over time.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are dispelled and slowed for 5s.

 If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control and receives 50% of their experience bounty, and a Neutral Token, if it is available. Enchantress can control up to 1 creeps at a time for up to 30s. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.

abilities.name: Sproink
abilities.description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.

abilities.name: Little Friends
abilities.description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

abilities.name: Forest Freebie
abilities.description: When a neutral token drops, 1 additional token will drop, if available.

facets.name: enchantress_overprotective_wisps
facets.title: Overprotective Wisps
facets.description: Whenever Enchantress takes more than 250 damage from enemy heroes, 1 wisps appear for 4s to heal her. A maximum of 4 overprotective wisps can exist at the same time.

facets.name: enchantress_spellbound
facets.title: Spellbound
facets.description: Cast Range of Enchant is increased. If the enemy is a hero, Enchantress has increased attack range against the target.

abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and silencing them.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack. Multiple attacks will stack additional damage. Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.

abilities.name: Blood Magic
abilities.description: Huskar does not have mana. Mana costs of items are converted into health costs.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health and slow both their movement and attack speed. While leaping, Huskar is Debuff Immune and has 60% increased magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: huskar_bloodbath
facets.title: Bloodbath
facets.description: Life Break also slows enemies in a radius around the target.

facets.name: huskar_nothl_transfusion
facets.title: Nothl Transfusion
facets.description: Life Break also heals friendly units in a radius around the target.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit, reduces its vision and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and its effects lasts longer.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced and take damage over time while near him. The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: Dark Ascension
abilities.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

abilities.name: Heart of Darkness
abilities.description: During the night, Night Stalker's health regeneration is increased by 40%, and during the day it is decreased by 20%.

facets.name: night_stalker_blinding_void
facets.title: Blinding Void
facets.description: Enemies affected by Void do not share vision with their allies. Affected enemies take damage per second when they are not visible to their allies.

facets.name: night_stalker_dayswap
facets.title: Night Reign
facets.description: The game now starts at night instead of day. Night is longer than day.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description:
Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase and increases her Turn Rate, while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement.

 Spin Web charges restore every 27 seconds, with a max of 4 charges.

Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks and extra damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Spinner's Snare
abilities.description: Broodmother may create up to 5 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered. Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.

abilities.name: Spider's Milk
abilities.description: Whenever Broodmother kills a unit, she and all units under her control in a 600 radius receive a buff that heals them for a percentage of the victims health every 0.5 seconds. Healing from creeps is reduced by 40%.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing them for 4 seconds. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

facets.name: broodmother_necrotic_webs
facets.title: Necrotic Webs
facets.description: Reduces health regeneration of enemies on webs.

facets.name: broodmother_feeding_frenzy
facets.title: Feeding Frenzy
facets.description: Insatiable Hunger also applies to nearby Spiderlings.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by 100% for 0.35s. The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Friendly Shadow
abilities.description: Applies Shadow Walk and all of its bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is 1s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.

abilities.name: Big Game Hunter
abilities.description: When getting a kill or assist on an enemy that has a killing streak, Bounty Hunter receives 10% extra gold.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, increasing the damage they take and providing information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

facets.name: bounty_hunter_shuriken
facets.title: Through and Through
facets.description: Shuriken Toss applies its damage and slow to all enemies it passes through.

facets.name: bounty_hunter_mugging
facets.title: Cutpurse
facets.description: Bounty Hunter steals gold when targeting enemy heroes with his abilities or items.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

facets.name: weaver_skitterstep
facets.title: Skitterstep
facets.description: Shukuchi movespeed increased and slows enemies when passing through them.

facets.name: weaver_hivemind
facets.title: Hivemind
facets.description: Weaver gains experience when The Swarm beetles attack heroes.

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: Double Trouble
abilities.description: Jakiro's attacks launch an attack from each head, but deal 50% less damage each.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

facets.name: jakiro_fire
facets.title: Liquid Fire
facets.description: Jakiro can imbue his attacks with Attack Speed Slow and Damage over Time in an AoE.

facets.name: jakiro_ice
facets.title: Liquid Frost
facets.description: Jakiro can imbue his attacks with Movement Speed Slow and a debuff that amplifies damage from his other spells.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air. The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.

abilities.name: Smoldering Resin
abilities.description: Batrider's attacks apply a debuff that deals 15% of the attack damage every 1s for 2s.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities. Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

facets.name: batrider_buff_on_displacement
facets.title: Stoked
facets.description: Batrider gains Move Speed and Spell Amplification when displacing enemies.

facets.name: batrider_arsonist
facets.title: Arsonist
facets.description: Sticky Napalm deals damage to structures.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly. Chen can attack the Penitence target with bonus attack range.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives a percentage of its bounty. Its maximum health is set to 400 + 50 per Chen Level. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.

abilities.name: Divine Favor
abilities.description:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing and health regeneration they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.

abilities.name: Summon Convert
abilities.description:
Chen summons a convert to fight for him. The convert gains bonuses from Holy Persuasion and dies if Chen dies. Its maximum health is set to 220 + 80 per Chen Level.

 The spell stays on cooldown while the convert is alive, but refreshes whenever Chen respawns. The Convert counts towards Holy Persuasion max unit count.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 10 seconds afterwards.

facets.name: chen_centaur_convert
facets.title: Centaur Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.

facets.name: chen_wolf_convert
facets.title: Wolf Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Giant Wolf or Alpha Wolf.

facets.name: chen_hellbear_convert
facets.title: Hellbear Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.

facets.name: chen_troll_convert
facets.title: Troll Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.

facets.name: chen_satyr_convert
facets.title: Satyr Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 400 radius around them.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. Illusions spawned from this ability follow the same rules as Shadow Step illusions and can also be swapped to by using Reality.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to haunt a single visible enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places with any haunting illusion.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They ignore terrain.

abilities.name: Spectral
abilities.description: Spectre and her illusions are permanently phased.

facets.name: spectre_forsaken
facets.title: Forsaken
facets.description: If an enemy has only non-hero allies nearby, it will take 60% of Desolate's damage.

facets.name: spectre_twist_the_knife
facets.title: Twist the Knife
facets.description: Haunt illusions no longer disappear when their target dies.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed. If alt-cast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.

abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents them from casting spells or healing in any way, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Lvl ? Pain
abilities.description: Doom's attacks deal 15% bonus damage to heroes whose level is lower than Doom's level.

facets.name: doom_bringer_gluttony
facets.title: Gluttony
facets.description: Devour now has 2 charges and stolen creep abilities are upgraded by one level.

facets.name: doom_bringer_boost_selling
facets.title: Devil's Bargain
facets.description: Doom can sell items for %bonus_item_sellback_percent% of their value, but his buyback costs are increased by %bonus_buyback_penalty%%.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.description: Places Death Rime Stacks on an enemy that can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that applies Death Rime Stacks and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range and heavy magic damage. Applies a Death Rime Stack that lasts for 4 seconds. Additionally applies a 100% slow for 0.7 seconds.

abilities.name: Death Rime
abilities.description: Ancient Apparition's abilities apply Death Rime Stacks on enemies. Death Rime slows enemies' movement speed and deals damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, gaining Death Rime Stacks and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

facets.name: ancient_apparition_bone_chill
facets.title: Bone Chill
facets.description: Each Death Rime Stack also reduces the enemy's Strength.

facets.name: ancient_apparition_exposure
facets.title: Exposure
facets.description: Cold Feet becomes an AoE point targeted ability, with the radius depending on the current level of Ice Blast.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed and slow resistance for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 8 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.description: Ursa gains bonus damage equal to a percentage of his Current HP.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

facets.name: ursa_grudge_bearer
facets.title: Grudge Bearer
facets.description: When damaged during Enrage, Ursa gains bonus attack damage.

facets.name: ursa_debuff_reduce
facets.title: Bear Down
facets.description: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last 20% longer.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects. All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash. If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Bulldoze
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Planar Pocket
abilities.description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting enemy hero spells in a radius towards him.

abilities.name: Herd Mentality
abilities.description: The hero on your team whose level is lower than anybody else's on your team gains 50% more experience.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

facets.name: spirit_breaker_bull_rush
facets.title: Bull Rush
facets.description: Charge of Darkness bonus movement speed lingers after charge ends.

facets.name: spirit_breaker_imbalanced
facets.title: Imbalanced
facets.description: Enemy targets hit by Nether Strike will be moved further by allied knockback effects.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks. Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike. Lasts 12 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: Chop Shop
abilities.description: Gyrocopter can disassemble most items.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.description: Call down 3 aerial missile strikes that slow and damage enemy units in a target area. Each strike is 500 distance from the previous one.

facets.name: gyrocopter_secondary_strikes
facets.title: Secondary Strikes
facets.description: The delay between hits is decreased by -0.2s. Any enemy hero hit by a call down missile strike will be marked, and another, tracking missile strike that has a 200 impact radius will be fired at them. This missile deals 50% damage.

facets.name: gyrocopter_afterburner
facets.title: Afterburner
facets.description: Every successful hit of a Rocket Barrage rocket on an enemy hero increases Gyrocopter's movement speed.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Corrosive Weaponry
abilities.description: Alchemist coats his weapons with an acid that applies a stacking slow and base attack damage reduction to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Berserk Potion
abilities.description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 36 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: alchemist_seed_money
facets.title: Seed Money
facets.description: Alchemist starts with 250 more gold.

facets.name: alchemist_mixologist
facets.title: Mixologist
facets.description: While Alchemist is affected by Chemical Rage, cooldown is reduced by 50%.

abilities.name: Quas
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements.

abilities.name: Wex
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements.

abilities.name: Exort
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements.

abilities.name: Invoke
abilities.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each orb level. 

 Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of Quas . The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage and healing invoker. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of Quas .

abilities.name: Ghost Walk
abilities.description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible and gaining health and mana regen. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas , and slows Invoker as well based on the level of Wex .

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of Wex . Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of Quas . Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in Wex .

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: E.M.P.
abilities.description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of Wex . Deals damage for each point of mana drained. If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 25% of the mana drained.

abilities.name: Alacrity
abilities.description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of Wex and their damage based on the level of Exort .

abilities.name: Chaos Meteor
abilities.description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of Exort , and rolling further based on the level of Wex . Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of Exort .

abilities.name: Sun Strike
abilities.description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of Exort , however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Forge Spirit
abilities.description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of Exort while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of Quas . The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. Spawns two spirits when Quas and Exort are at least level 4.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of Quas . The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas and deals damage each second based on the level of Exort .

abilities.name: Deafening Blast
abilities.description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of Exort . The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of Quas , then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of Wex .

abilities.name: Mastermind
abilities.description: When Invoker denies a lane creep, he gets 25% of the XP.

facets.name: invoker_agnostic
facets.title: Agnostic
facets.description: Passively grants bonus attack damage.

facets.name: invoker_elitist
facets.title: Elitist
facets.description: Invoker applies a debuff that increases Spell Damage taken by the target for each Exort instance that lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. If a target casts a spell, they are silenced for 2 seconds. The duration is paused as long as the target is silenced.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, stealing his target's Intelligence with each hit and dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. After 4 attacks on the same target, that enemy will be silenced for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enemies within 1200 range of Silencer are slowed and damaged every second for each Silence they have on them.

abilities.name: Brain Drain
abilities.description: If Silencer kills an enemy hero, he permanently steals 2 Intelligence.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

facets.name: silencer_irrepressible
facets.title: Irrepressible
facets.description: Silencer cannot be silenced.

facets.name: silencer_reverberating_silence
facets.title: Reverberating Silence
facets.description: The first time Global Silence ends on a unit it is applied again.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Passively grants a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.

abilities.name: Ominous Discernment
abilities.description: Outworld Destroyer gains an additional 2 mana per point of Intelligence.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment. Deals bonus damage to illusions.

facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_obsidian_decimator
facets.title: Obsidian Decimator
facets.description: When Essence Flux restores mana, it also temporarily increases maximum mana.

facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_overwhelming_devourer
facets.title: Overwhelming Devourer
facets.description: Affected Heroes gain a Mana Allergy Debuff for 7 seconds, healing Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Summons 2 wolves to aid Lycan in battle

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage of all enemies within 2000 range of Lycan and his wolves. At night, Howl's armor and attack damage reductions are global.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Wolf Bite
abilities.description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 40% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200 range of each other.

abilities.name: Apex Predator
abilities.description: Deal 2% extra damage to neutral creeps per hero level.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan moves at increased speed and cannot be slowed.

facets.name: lycan_pack_leader
facets.title: Pack Leader
facets.description: Movement and critical strike bonuses are also applied to all units under Lycan's control. Enemy heroes killed by Lycan or his units extends Shapeshift duration by 5s.

facets.name: lycan_spirit_wolves
facets.title: Spirit Wolves
facets.description: Summoned Wolves are invulnerable and uncontrollable spirits that do not attack, but provide health and damage bonuses to Lycan.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Cinder Brew
abilities.description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any Magic or Pure damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description:
Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls, gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.
Earth Brawler - Grants 1 armor and 4% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are 2.5x when Brewed Up.
Storm Brawler - Grants 10% evasion and 4% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are 2.5x when Brewed Up.
Fire Brawler - Grants 20% chance to critical strike for 120% of your attack damage and 10 Attack Speed. Crit Chance and Attack Speed is 2.5x when Brewed Up.
 Void Brawler - Grants 4% bonus Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 5% Slow for 2s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are 2.5x when affected by Cinder Brew.

abilities.name: Primal Companion
abilities.description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

facets.name: brewmaster_roll_out_the_barrel
facets.title: Roll Out the Barrel
facets.description: Cinder Brew is now a rolling barrel of ale that drenches enemies in its path and explodes at the end.

facets.name: brewmaster_drunken_master
facets.title: Drunken Master
facets.description: When brewed up, Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, altering between 20% slower and 50% faster for the duration.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration. Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit with bonus base damage are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Disseminate
abilities.description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within 675 range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison
abilities.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each. This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

abilities.name: Demonic Cleanse
abilities.description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration. At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Menace
abilities.description: Shadow Demon's Attacks apply a stacking 2% Amplify Damage debuff to the enemy for 8 seconds.

facets.name: shadow_demon_promulgate
facets.title: Promulgate
facets.description: If the target is an enemy, they lose 15% of their health, regaining half of it after the effect is lifted. If the target is an ally, increases their health by that amount instead.

facets.name: shadow_demon_facet_soul_mastery
facets.title: Shadow Servant
facets.description: Shadow Demon creates illusions of heroes that die near him.

abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 20% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.
Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.

abilities.name: Spirit Link
abilities.description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing their attack speed as well as sharing a percentage of their armor and lifesteal with each other.

abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.

abilities.name: True Form
abilities.description: Lone Druid starts a transformation into a raging bear that has enhanced attack and defensive capabilities.

facets.name: lone_druid_bear_with_me
facets.title: Bear with Me
facets.description: Lone Druid morphs himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor, more health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.

facets.name: lone_druid_unbearable
facets.title: Unbearable
facets.description: Lone Druid morphs his Spirit Bear into an enraged form that gains bonus armor, attack speed, demolish damage, and a 75% cooldown on Entangling Claws.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength with bonus lifesteal. Deals 2x damage to creeps, but lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 70%.

abilities.name: Reins of Chaos
abilities.description: Whenever illusions of Chaos Knight are created, there is a 50% chance that an additional 1 extra illusion will spawn.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 350% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: chaos_knight_strong_illusions
facets.title: Phantasmagoria
facets.description: All Chaos Knight Illusions are Strong Illusions and take less damage when near him.

facets.name: chaos_knight_irrationality
facets.title: Irrationality
facets.description: Reality Rift has equal chances of applying Break, Disarm, or Nothing for 50% of the base debuff duration in addition to its normal effects.

abilities.name: Earthbind
abilities.description: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Poof
abilities.description:
Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations. 

If the ability is in alt-cast state, all Meepos will also cast Poof to the target. When cast on the ground, all Meepos except the selected one will Poof to the closest location.

abilities.name: Ransack
abilities.description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.

abilities.name: Dig
abilities.description:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3s. Restores 25% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: MegaMeepo
abilities.description:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a 600 radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains 40% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

 When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.

abilities.name: Divided We Stand
abilities.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears. If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: MegaMeepo Fling
abilities.description: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a 900 range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.

abilities.name: Sticky Fingers
abilities.description: Has an extra choice of neutral item to select from.

facets.name: meepo_more_meepo
facets.title: More Meepo
facets.description: Can now be upgraded at level 3 and every 7 levels afterwards to a max level of 4. Duplicate Meepos receive 85% of the main Meepo's bonus attributes.

facets.name: meepo_pack_rat
facets.title: Pack Rat
facets.description: All Meepos can use the item in the neutral item slot.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for 3 seconds. While nearby trees or affected by Nature's Grasp, Treant gains bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

facets.name: treant_primeval_power
facets.title: Primeval Power
facets.description: Treant gains +5 base attack damage per hero level.

facets.name: treant_sapling
facets.title: Sapling
facets.description: Leech Seed can be ground targeted, planting a tree that heals allies and damages all enemies in the effect radius for the duration of the ability. Damage to creeps is reduced by 50%. If the tree is cut down, it immediately re-grows again.

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing 150 + 1.5x Ogre's Strength in damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

abilities.name: Fire Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Dumb Luck
abilities.description: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength.

abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.

facets.name: ogre_magi_fat_chance
facets.title: Fat Chance
facets.description: Multicast chance is increased by 0.06% of Ogre Magi's Strength.

facets.name: ogre_magi_learning_curve
facets.title: Learning Curve
facets.description: Level requirement of all spells and talents reduced by 1. You get 0 Ability Points at level one and 3 Ability Points at level two.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals 2x damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point. Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them. Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Ceaseless Dirge
abilities.description: When Undying dies he will instantly respawn in the fountain. Begins the game on cooldown.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

facets.name: undying_rotting_mitts
facets.title: Rotting Mitts
facets.description: While transformed into a Flesh Golem, attacks spawn a zombie.

facets.name: undying_ripped
facets.title: Ripped
facets.description: Casting Soul Rip on allies increases their Strength by a percentage of Undying's Strength.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Supremacy
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.

abilities.name: Might and Magus
abilities.description: Each 1% Spell Amplification also increases Rubick's attack damage by 1% and Magic Resistance by 0.75%.

facets.name: rubick_frugal_filch
facets.title: Frugal Filch
facets.description: Stolen spells also have lower mana cost.

facets.name: rubick_arcane_accumulation
facets.title: Arcane Accumulation
facets.description: Casting a spell temporarily increases the area of effect for all subsequent spells.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100% for 0.4 seconds. Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage based on distance glimpsed, with max damage dealt at 1400 distance.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Electromagnetic Repulsion
abilities.description: Whenever Disruptor takes more than 250 damage from any source within 400 radius, all nearby enemies within are pushed back up to a 400 unit distance.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

facets.name: disruptor_thunderstorm
facets.title: Thunderstorm
facets.description: Thunder Strike additionally hits all enemies within Kinetic Field.

facets.name: disruptor_line_walls
facets.title: Kinetic Fence
facets.description: Replaces Kinetic Field with the ability to create impassable walls.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units take damage, then are hurled into the air and stunned.

abilities.name: Mind Flare
abilities.description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a percentage of its Max Mana. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx Assassin in the past 15s.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mind Flare and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

abilities.name: Nyxth Sense
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin can detect invisible heroes within 400 units of himself.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus. If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack. Nyx Assassin has 75 additional attack range and a 70% faster attack animation for this attack.

facets.name: nyx_assassin_burn_mana
facets.title: Mana Burn
facets.description: Nyx's damage from spells and items burns enemies' mana.

facets.name: nyx_assassin_scuttle
facets.title: Scuttle
facets.description: For the first 15s of Vendetta, Nyx is hasted and has unobstructed pathing.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description:
Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking. Can target invulnerable and sleeping units.

abilities.name: Eelskin
abilities.description: Naga Siren gets 6% evasion per other Naga Siren within 900 radius.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Allies in range recover a percentage of their health per second. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

facets.name: naga_siren_passive_riptide
facets.title: Rip Tide
facets.description: Every 6 attacks from Naga and her illusions, enemies around them are damaged and their Armor is reduced.

facets.name: naga_siren_active_riptide
facets.title: Deluge
facets.description: Naga Siren can create a splash around herself and her illusions, damaging enemies and reducing their Status Resistance.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is 400 range over 0.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Chakra Magic
abilities.description: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all basic abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount. Is 25% more effective when used on himself.

abilities.name: Will-O-Wisp
abilities.description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.

abilities.name: Spirit Form
abilities.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies.

abilities.name: Mana Magnifier
abilities.description: Allies within 900 range of Keeper of the Light have 15% more mana. Lingers for 5 seconds.

facets.name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_solar_bind
facets.description: Grants the Solar Bind ability while active.

facets.name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_recall
facets.title: Recall
facets.description: Grants the Recall ability while active.

abilities.name: Tether
abilities.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether. Tether slows and damages enemies touching it.

abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it. Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode. When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Io gains health regeneration based on max health. If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains any bonuses granted by Overcharge.

abilities.name: Spirits In
abilities.description: Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Spirits Out
abilities.description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Relocate
abilities.description: Teleports Io and a tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires, Io and the tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

abilities.name: Sight Seer
abilities.description: Io's Team takes 1s less to take watchers, and their watchers have 300 bonus vision.

facets.name: wisp_kritzkrieg
facets.title: Kritzkrieg
facets.description: Overcharge grants attack speed and spell amplification to Io and any Tethered allies.

facets.name: wisp_medigun
facets.title: Medigun
facets.description: Overcharge grants armor and magic resistance to Io and any Tethered allies.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage. If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Silent as the Grave
abilities.description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 35 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.description: Conjures 2 blind Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health. Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

facets.name: visage_sepulchre
facets.title: Sepulchre
facets.description: The ability can be cast in the alt-cast state to recall Visages familiars after 4s, during which they cannot attack or act.

facets.name: visage_faithful_followers
facets.title: Faithful Followers
facets.description:
Familiars will automatically attack the target Visage tried to attack last, and will return if that target is out of Visage's attack range, or Visage issues the cancel current action or hold position commands.

The ability can be toggled to the Auto-Cast state to command the Familiars to return to Visage and not leave his side until the state has been disabled.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description:
After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 30% of the damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects. That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1 Agility.

abilities.name: Depth Shroud
abilities.description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

abilities.name: Barracuda
abilities.description: When not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.

facets.name: slark_leeching_leash
facets.title: Leeching Leash
facets.description: Pounce applies stacks of Essence Shift when striking enemy heroes.

facets.name: slark_dark_reef_renegade
facets.title: Dark Reef Renegade
facets.description: Barracuda lingers after being revealed to the enemy if Slark is not nearby allied heroes.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.description:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. Damage and speed increases with each jump. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake returns a percentage of the targets' total mana.

abilities.name: Mana Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 98% of incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana. Illusions absorb less damage per point of mana.

abilities.name: Cold Blooded
abilities.description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.

facets.name: medusa_engorged
facets.title: Engorged
facets.description: Mystic Snakes returning to Medusa empower her next 3 attacks with +1 additional damage for each 6 mana restored. Lasts up to 5s.

facets.name: medusa_mana_pact
facets.title: Mana Pact
facets.description: Mana Shield can be activated, draining 3% of max mana per second to gain 3.5% attack speed bonus per second, up to 35%. Maximum effect reached after 10s. Buff lasts 15s and Cooldown is 35s.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description:
While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.

Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: troll_warlord_insensitive
facets.title: Insensitive
facets.description: Fervor grants armor per stack while in melee form.

facets.name: troll_warlord_bad_influence
facets.title: Bad Influence
facets.description: Battle Trance grants allied heroes 30% of the attack speed bonus.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: After a brief windup, Centaur Warrunner slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. During the delay, he is disarmed but can move.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Retaliate
abilities.description: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage of your strength. Deals half damage to towers.

abilities.name: Work Horse
abilities.description: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

abilities.name: Rawhide
abilities.description: Permanently gain 30 max health every 120s.

facets.name: centaur_counter_strike
facets.title: Counter-Strike
facets.description: Double Edge damage is increased by 25% of the damage Centaur took in the last 6s from enemy Heroes, up to a total of 100% bonus Double Edge damage. Damage resets when Double Edge is cast.

facets.name: centaur_horsepower
facets.title: Horsepower
facets.description: Centaur Warrunner gains Movement Speed based on his Strength.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him, and slowing them for a brief period.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives 50% larger bonus.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and affected by slowed movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Horn Toss
abilities.description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and are stunned while in the air and an additional amount of time after landing.

abilities.name: Solid Core
abilities.description: Magnus suffers 50% less knockback from enemy's abilities and items.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, pulling all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a damaging slam.

facets.name: magnataur_run_through
facets.title: Run Through
facets.description: Deals additional damage when skewering enemies into trees or cliffs.

facets.name: magnataur_reverse_reverse_polarity
facets.title: Reverse Reverse Polarity
facets.description: Reverse Polarity pushes enemies away all around Magnus instead of pulling enemies that are in front of him.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it. Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Hero attacks are counted as 3x the amount.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

abilities.name: Exposure Therapy
abilities.description: Whenever Timbersaw destroys a tree, he gains 3 mana.

facets.name: shredder_shredder
facets.title: Shredder
facets.description: When Timbersaw collides with the target tree, it shatters, sending 10 splinters in all directions, up to 700 distance. If a splinter hits an enemy, they take damage and are slowed for a brief duration.

facets.name: shredder_second_chakram
facets.title: Twisted Chakram
facets.description: This facet grants the ability Twisted Chakram .

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed for 6 seconds. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 275 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: Hairball
abilities.description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

facets.name: bristleback_berserk
facets.title: Berserk
facets.description: Warpath grants scaling Attack Speed instead of Damage.

facets.name: bristleback_snot_rocket
facets.title: Snot Rocket
facets.description: Instead of releasing Quill Spray from taking damage, he instead launches Nasal Goo of the current level at all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.

abilities.name: Bitter Chill
abilities.description: Passively slows the attack speed of all enemies within 350 radius.

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike with bonus damage so powerful it launches its victim into the air.

facets.name: tusk_facet_tag_team
facets.title: Tag Team
facets.description: Tusk can cast Tag Team causing nearby enemies to receive bonus damage from attacks.

facets.name: tusk_facet_fist_bump
facets.title: Drinking Buddies
facets.description: Tusk can cast Drinking Buddies , pulling him and a teammate closer and granting both bonus Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence. Upon impact, leaves a debuff that increases Skywrath Mage's spell lifesteal against the target.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range. Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect. Deals 75% damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Ruin and Restoration
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage has 20% Spell Lifesteal.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2 seconds.

facets.name: skywrath_mage_shield
facets.title: Shield of the Scion
facets.description: Skywrath Mage gains a magic damage barrier when dealing damage to heroes.

facets.name: skywrath_mage_staff
facets.title: Staff of the Scion
facets.description: Skywrath Mage's Cooldowns are reduced when he deals spell damage to enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description:
